name: David Riklan
who_you_serve: Self-improvement readers, entrepreneurs, and people seeking personal growth
what_you_do: President and founder of Self Improvement Online, Inc., the leading provider of self-improvement and personal growth information on the Internet. SelfGrowth.com gets millions of visitors a year; publishes email newsletters to over 300,000 weekly subscribers on self improvement, natural health, personal growth, relationships, home business, sales skills.
seeking: Joint venture partnerships, self-improvement experts to partner with, webinar presenters/trainers
offering: Official Guide Program advertising, joint venture coaching and training, massive audience reach (100M+ unique visitors), co-founder of JVDirectory.com
bio: Author of 8 books including Self Improvement: The Top 101 Experts; Mastering the World of Marketing and Mastering the World of Selling (John Wiley). Degree in chemical engineering; 20 years in sales, marketing, management; former Dale Carnegie Training instructor.
notes:
Best contact: Email David@selfgrowth.com, Phone 732-617-1030, or JV Directory Contact Form.
